Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Model.Gods

Class Hestia

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Model.Gods.God
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Model.Gods.Hestia
public class Hestia
extends God
If a Player has Hestia, their Worker can build a second time, but this second construction cannot be on a perimeter slot.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • build

      public void build​(Direction direction, Worker worker) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException, InvalidBuildException, InvalidDirectionException
      This method allows a second build only if the chosen slot is a perimeter slot.
      Overrides:
      build in class God
      Parameters:
      direction - specifies the slot where to build
      worker - one of the player's workers
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the worker try to build in a direction that is out out the board
      InvalidDirectionException - if there are problems with I/O
      InvalidBuildException - if building is not permitted.

    • checkIfCanBuild

      public boolean checkIfCanBuild​(Worker worker)
      This method directly calls the God's method checkIfCanBuildInNormalConditions or does a special check for the second build, controlling if the slots is a perimeter slot.
      Overrides:
      checkIfCanBuild in class God
      Parameters:
      worker - Player's Worker selected to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the worker can build, false otherwise.

    • checkIfCanGoOn

      public boolean checkIfCanGoOn​(Worker worker)
      This method checks if the worker is paralyzed or not.
      Overrides:
      checkIfCanGoOn in class God
      Parameters:
      worker - the worker chosen to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the worker can go on, false otherwise.
